name: Good2Gether
overview:
Good2Gether gives nonprofits, which traditionally have limited web traffic, access to an online network of millions of unique visitors through its media partners.

Good2Gether can be implemented on any website by inserting a bit of code. From there, Good2Gether automatically connects content with relevant causes. For example, one of the company’s “Connect2Cause widgets” next to an article on Katrina would display links to local events, volunteer opportunities, and organizations whose focus is Katrina, right alongside that article.
